title: `plot_trajectories` ValueError: Unrecognized track_method

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
Thanks for opening this issue, and thanks for using DeepLabCut (we hope you are enjoying it ;). Please fill out the template completely, including the full "traceback" and input code that you ran to hit this error. MacOS 10.15.7. DLC version 2.2rc2 for using GUI to label frames, DLC version 2.1.104 Google Colab for training network and analyzing videos. **Describe the problem** I get an error when trying to run the Plot trajectories step in the colab notebook Please place code inside this:
Code output

``` Analyzing all the videos in the directory... Loading /content/drive/My Drive/deeplabcut/oft-hs-2021-07-18/videos/7357 58 OFT CNO001.wmv and data. No unfiltered data file found in /content/drive/My Drive/deeplabcut/oft-hs-2021-07-18/videos for video 7357 58 OFT CNO001 and scorer DLC_resnet50_oftJul18shuffle1_10000. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- FileNotFoundError Traceback (most recent call last) /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcut/utils/plotting.py in plot_trajectories(config, videos, videotype, shuffle, trainingsetindex, filtered, displayedbodyparts, displayedindividuals, showfigures, destfolder, modelprefix, track_method, imagetype, resolution, linewidth) 257 df, _, _, suffix = auxiliaryfunctions.load_analyzed_data( --> 258 videofolder, vname, DLCscorer, filtered, track_method 259 ) 4 frames FileNotFoundError: No unfiltered data file found in /content/drive/My Drive/deeplabcut/oft-hs-2021-07-18/videos for video 7357 58 OFT CNO001 and scorer DLC_resnet50_oftJul18shuffle1_10000. During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred: ValueError Traceback (most recent call last) /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/deeplabcut/utils/auxiliaryfunctions.py in load_detection_data(video, scorer, track_method) 768 tracker = "el" 769 else: --> 770 raise ValueError(f"Unrecognized track_method={track_method}") 771 772 filepath = os.path.splitext(video)[0] + scorer + f"_{tracker}.pickle" ValueError: Unrecognized track_method= ```

**How to Reproduce the problem** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. Use GUI to create project, extract and label frames 2. Use colab notebook to train and evaluate results 3. try to run the plot trajectories and get the error Add any other context about the problem here.
